item.description:
Rubblebucket is a ten-piece psychedelic afrobeat band led by trumpeter/composer Alex Toth and vocalist/saxophonist Kalmia Traver (both members of the cutting edge nationally renowned reggae band John Brown's Body). Minimalist, Poly-rhythmic, Exotic, Lush, Driving, Trance. Fela Kuti meets James Brown meets Portishead.

The music starts at 9:45pm but at Johnny D's we'll need to reserve a table ahead of time in order to be able to sit together. I'd like to get a table at 9:30 (for dinner) to give us a chance to get together ahead of the show.

If you want to join us Please RSVP so I can get a head count for the table.
item.name: Rubble Bucket Orchestra at Johnny D's
